name: count_object
description: count the objects of a specific type in a location

name: pick_object
description: get, fetch, grasp, pick, or take an object in a location

name: place_object
description: place, or put an object in a location

name: offer_object
description: deliver, offer, or bring an object to a person in a location

name: find_person
description: identify, look for, search for or find a person in a waypoint using a color or a human sign

name: follow_person
description: walk behind a person from a location to another location

name: guide_person
description: take, escort, lead, or guide a person from a location to another location

name: answer_quiz
description: answer a quiz to a person in a location

name: speak
description: speak, or tell something to a person in a location

name: move_to
description: move from a location to another location
